animal.question: I meow and like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐾 I have soft paws.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🏡 I guard your house.
🎾 I love to fetch!

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🧡 I have webbed feet.
🌾 I like to eat bread.
💧 I love to play in the water.

animal.question: I moo and give milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass.
🐄 My baby is called a calf.
⚫ I can have black and white spots.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big and strong.
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like to eat carrots.
🐇 I have a fluffy tail.
🌿 I sometimes live in a burrow.

animal.question: I roar and have a mane. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am the king of the jungle.
🥩 I eat meat.
🦁 My roar is very loud.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa.
🐎 I look like a horse.
🌿 I like to eat grass.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🙊 I like to make funny noises.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🐒 I have a long tail and can be very playful.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and hiss. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have no legs.
☠️ Some of us are poisonous.
🐭 I like to eat small animals.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of water
🧤 You might build a snowman with me
🏠 I make everything look white when I cover it

weather.question: I am hot and yellow and shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I am out
🌻 Plants love me!
🔥 I give you warmth

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I sometimes look like animals
✈️ Airplanes fly through me
💧 I can bring rain

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I'm here
💦 Puddles form when I fall
🌱 Plants need me to grow

weather.question: I make the leaves dance in the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ I can blow your hat off
🪁 You can fly a kite with me
🍃 I can be gentle or strong

weather.question: I am a big storm with lots of rain and loud thunder. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I have lightning!
⛈️ You might see me after a hot day
🏠 Stay inside when I arrive!

weather.question: I am a colorful arc that appears after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors
☀️ The sun needs to be shining for me to appear
🍀 Some people believe there's gold at the end of me

weather.question: I am very cold and turn water into ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 Ice cubes are made of me
🥶 You shiver when I am around
🏔️ Some places have me all the time

weather.question: I am a mix of water vapor and tiny ice crystals that makes it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 👻 I am like a cloud near the ground
🚗 Be careful driving when I'm around
🏙️ I am often seen in cities or near water

weather.question: I am frozen raindrops that fall from the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ⚾ I am small balls of ice
🧊 I can damage cars and roofs
⛈️ I often fall during thunderstorms
